reviews.review: good game
nice game

It is a good story, I loved Wheatley's waffling and reactions, and it was nice to learn some of the history of Aperture.
The puzzles are fun, although Veterans from The Talos Principle or Baba Is You might find them a bit on the easy side I dunno. Worth playing just to hear Wheatley waffle on about anything but waffles.

Что могу сказать об этой игре? Она очень увлекательна и до сих пор держит свою репутацию, даже не смотря на то, что разрабы редко делают обновление. Увлекательный сюжет, эпичная битва, атмосферные локации-всё найдёте в этой игре. А что ещё интереснее, так это редактор уровней, к этому есть спец моды или хаммер, где можно делать камеры ещё интересней. Для любителей поиграть с другом есть кооп режим, так и основной, так и в сообществе. Сейчас наша страна терпит не лучшие времена, так что можете купить игру через VPN или из каких-нибудь сайтов. Строго рекомендую!

If the program freezes, beginners might be confused how to close the program and just turn their computer off, with a lot of important stuff closed as well, but the task manager has the right thing.
First, if you're a true beginner to computers, press ctrl alt delete, and the delete is not the backspace, or ctrl shift esc, and the shift is the shift button, [i]and[/i] esc might be escape on your keyboard, just keep in mind that both of them require you press them at the same time
Second, do not click the misleading "end task" on "portal2.exe", go to the processes tab and try to catch the portal 2 program, and [i]then[/i] press end task

Includes a funny robot friend and a funny robot enemy. 

pros:
+The jokes are too fun for us stupid humans
+Wheatley
+Very good voice acting
+Excelent gameplay
+No long cutscenes and the focus is on the gameplay instead of the story so has so much replay value
+Good physics engine
+Challenging but not too hard levels
+Amazing workshop support
+Super cheap (I got it for 0,89€)

cons:
-Multiplayer can be a bit annoying if your friends are braindead
-Very short campaign
-replay value limited if you are here only for the jokes

Overall a must play game and one of Valves best titles 9/10

Buen Plataformero, de calidad

Great game, but please Valve, PLEASE let Mac users play this game. I feel cheated, I spent $30 on this game and Portal 1, but now it's all gone because of the new MacOS update. It's simple to do, Valve did it with CS:GO, all they have to do it change the game from 32 bits to 64 bits. Same goes with TF2, I want to play that game, but now I can't. And before anybody tells me to go and buy a gaming PC, don't. I also am not going to download a windows emulator, because why should I have to deal with going through all these loops just to do something the creators could easily update? It's been like this for nearly a year.

Edit: I'm still mad lol

Fun game play and 11/10

I had been wanting this game since it first came out. But, at the time, I couldn't. I didn't have a computer, nor money, and was too young to easily get either. 
But finally getting my hands on it, it was well worth the wait. Even with the older graphics, it holds up, and everything has a sense of weight and gravity to it. From the first portal made to the last, I recommend this game to the moon and back. 

My only wish is that we could have something to save Wheatley with. He still makes me happy, even when he was trying to kill me.
One of the all-time great sequels to an all-time classic

Parasını fazlasıyla hak eden, oynarken beyninizi kullandığınız, hikayesiyle aksiyonuyla sizi alıp götürebilecek bir oyundur Portal 2. İlk oyunda yeni bir tema deneyen Valve, başarılı olan temayı bu oyunda hikaye, çevre dizaynı ve efektler ile geliştirmiş. Herkese oynamalarını öneririm.

Uno de los grandes clásicos de valve, que yo creo no puede decepcionar a nadie si te gustan los puzzles 
Lo puedes jugar sin haber jugado el primero (aunque es recomendable que lo juegues antes para enterarte de la historia), tiene una gran campaña y un modo cooperativo(2 jugadores) muy divertido.
Sin duda, muy recomendable
